headline: Introducing time.cloudflare.com

description: Cloudflare has always been a leader in deploying secure versions of insecure Internet protocols and making them available for free for anyone to use. In 2014, we launched one of the worldâ€™s first free, secure HTTPS service (Universal SSL) to go along with our existing free HTTP plan.
